title: SUDS Exercises
introText: SUDS helps you quickly rate how intense your distress feels on a 1-10 scale so you can notice patterns, track changes, and decide when to use coping skills.

exercises.title: SUDS Check-In
exercises.description: Track your current distress level and identify body sensations, thoughts, urges, and triggers.

exercises.title: SUDS Coping Plan
exercises.description: Create personalized coping strategies for different SUDS levels to manage distress effectively.

reminder.title: Remember
reminder.content: You don't need to eliminate distressâ€”just lower it enough to think clearly. Small shifts make it easier to choose how you want to respond.
